__TOC__


You have a few minutes to spare and are using one of the application below. There is an easy way to bring a valuable contribution to Ubuntu, test the version in -proposed. 

You are using Ubuntu 10.04 ? 

All you have to do is to install the version in -proposed, then you just use them as normal, making sure they didn't break anything, and leave your feedback on the appropriate launchpad bug.

Read <nowiki>[[Testing-EnableProposed|How to enable -proposed]]</nowiki> for documentation how to enable and use -proposed as well as this <nowiki>[[QATeam-PerformingSRUVerification|fantastic wiki page]]</nowiki> with helpful tools for finding bugs to work on.

Are you looking for a way to start giving some love back to your adorable Ubuntu Project?

This is a perfect time!, Everybody can help in testing! Open your IRC Client and go to #ubuntu-testing (freenode) the QA Team will be happy to help you to start contributing!
